snippet.title: Exogate Initiative - Alpha version trailer
snippet.description:
Exogate Initiative is a base-building and management indie game made by Xeno Bits.

Play Exogate Initiative Demo: https://xenobits.itch.io/exogate-initiative

You are in charge of mankind's first worlds exploration program. Build your base underground, manage your international specialists and be ready for new discoveries on exoplanets through the Exogate!

Wishlist Exogate Initiative on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1681060/Exogate_Initiative/
Twitter Exogate Initiative: https://twitter.com/ExogateInit
Twitter Xeno Bits: https://twitter.com/XenoBitsStudio
